title: White Mountains 3-Day Planning Playbook
summary: Three-day White Mountains blueprint with staged itineraries, weather thresholds, gear systems, and decision checklists for ridge-focused trips.

title: Adirondacks Canoe Camping Playbook
summary: Route logic, portage strategy, weather calls, and campsite operations for multi-day Adirondack canoe trips.

title: Beginner Backpacking Playbook
summary: Step-by-step systems for new backpackers covering packing, pacing, camp setup, and troubleshooting common issues.

title: Lightweight Packing Playbook
summary: Responsible weight-cutting framework with gear audits, swap decisions, and field routines to stay fast without losing safety margins.

title: All-Season Overnight Planning Playbook
summary: Season-aware overnight planning guide with gear adaptations, pacing strategies, and risk controls for spring through winter trips.

title: Navigation, Weather, Elevation Playbook
summary: Integrated navigation, weather, and elevation management system with thresholds, drills, and decision gates for reliable backcountry travel.
